//Ragnus//

  Looks at Shivah oddly for a second, as his shots must have missed, 
no ,matter...he knows he is not good with his guns.  Then his 
expression turns to one of pleasure.

  He gets to play with this bot in close.

  He gets to use his favoite toys.

  The small railgun retracts back into his arm, and he continues to 
come down to meet Shivah.  His energy blade comes down in a leathal 
arc aimed for the other bot's head.


> Shivah::
> 
> "A stupid dragon like bot, who isn't any of my bros are attaking 
me" 
> replied Shiva By comm link  while he took his sword and flew 
towards 
> Ragnus and when he looked him said "I saw you before... Youy was 
> around Decepticons' Base"
